MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Baillieston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm due to a damaged underground electricity cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:05pm on Monday, 04 January 2021
